name: Ditto Prism Star
author: kirisAki
flavor_text: With its astonishing capacity for metamorphosis, it can get along with anything. It does not get along well with its fellow Ditto.

abilities.name: Almighty Evolution
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may put any Stage 1 card from your hand onto this Pokémon to evolve it. You can’t use this Ability during your first turn or the turn this Pokémon was put into play.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Prism Star card with the same name in your deck. If a Prism Star card would go to the discard pile, put it in the Lost Zone instead.
